title: Mrs and Mr Peacock
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films, C. George Chaput and Kantital Rathod
brief_description: An example of child art. Nine-year-old Susan Elain Chaput wrote this story, drew the pictures and narrated the commentary. Tells with insight and humour, the story of Mr and Mrs Peacock, who live in the town of Onion, near a beautiful park called Me-Oh-My.
creator_credit_for_label: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films, C. George Chaput and Kantital Rathod
